gurmukhi: ErV au~Ty sUrmy; Aw fwhy m`Qy ]
transliteration: Orad Outthe Soorme Aa Daahe Matthe||
translation: The warriors arose in great numbers and have come to fight.

gurmukhi: k`t quPMgI kYbrI; dl gwih ink`Qy ]
translation: They have come to tread through the forces in order to destroy (the enemy) with guns and arrows.
The angels come down (to the earth) from the sky in order to see the war.51.

gurmukhi: duhW kMDwrW muh juVy; dl Gury ngwry ]
transliteration: Duhaan Kandhaaraan Muh Jude Dal Ghure Nagdare||
translation: The trumpets have sounded in the army and both the forces face each other.
The chief and brave warriors swayed in the field.

gurmukhi: lY kY qygW brCIAW; hiQAwr auBwry ]
transliteration: Lai Ke Tegadn Barchheeaan Hothiaar Oubhdare||
translation: They raised their weapons including the swords and daggers.

gurmukhi: top ptylw pwKrW; gil sMj svwry ]
transliteration: Top Patela Paakharaan Gad(i) Sanj Savdare||
translation: They have bedecked themselves with helmets on their heads, and armour around their necks alongwith their horse-sddles with belts.

gurmukhi: lY ky brCI durgswh; bhu dwnv mwry ]
transliteration: Lai Ke Barchhidurgsaah Bahu Daanav Mdare||
translation: Durga holding her dagger, killed many demons.

gurmukhi: cVy rQI gj GoiVeI; mwr Buie qy fwry ]
transliteration: Chade Rathigad Ghod(i)ee Maar Bhue Te Ddare||
translation: She killed and threw those on the round who were riding chariots, elephants and horses.

gurmukhi: jwx hlvweI sIK nwl; ivMnH vVy auqwry ]52]
transliteration: Jaan Halvaaiseekh Naal Vinnh Vade Outdare||52||
translation: It appear that the confectioner has cooked small round cakes of grounded pulse, piercing them with a spike.52.

gurmukhi: duhW kMDwrW muih juVy; nwl Dausw BwrI ]
transliteration: Duhaan Kandhaaraan Muh(i) Jude Naal Dhaousaa Bhdaree||
translation: Alongwith the sounding of the large trumpet, both the forces faced each other.

gurmukhi: leI BgauqI durgswh; vr jwgn BwrI ]
transliteration: Lai Bhagauthi Durgsaah Var Jaagad Bhdaree||
translation: Durga held out her sword, appearing like great lustrous fire;
